00066     public boolean isCorrectDatabaseImplementation(Connection conn) throws JDBCException {
00067         return PRODUCT_NAME.equalsIgnoreCase(getDatabaseProductName(conn));
00068     }

00070     public String getDefaultDriver(String url) {
00071         if (url.startsWith("jdbc:sqlserver")) {
00072             return "com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.SQLServerDriver";
00073         } else if (url.startsWith("jdbc:jtds:sqlserver")) {
00074             return "net.sourceforge.jtds.jdbc.Driver";
00075         }
00076         return null;
00077     }

00125     public String getDefaultCatalogName() throws JDBCException {
00126         try {
00127             return getConnection().getCatalog();
00128         } catch (SQLException e) {
00129             throw new JDBCException(e);
00130         }
00131     }

00141     public String getConcatSql(String... values) {
00142         StringBuffer returnString = new StringBuffer();
00143         for (String value : values) {
00144             returnString.append(value).append(" + ");
00145         }
00146 
00147         return returnString.toString().replaceFirst(" \\+ $", "");
00148     }

00196     public boolean isSystemTable(String catalogName, String schemaName, String tableName) {
00197         return super.isSystemTable(catalogName, schemaName, tableName) || schemaName.equals("sys");
00198     }
00199 
00200     public boolean isSystemView(String catalogName, String schemaName, String viewName) {
00201         return super.isSystemView(catalogName, schemaName, viewName) || schemaName.equals("sys");
00202     }
00203 
00204     public String generateDefaultConstraintName(String tableName, String columnName) {
00205         return "DF_" + tableName + "_" + columnName;
00206     }

00209     public Object convertDatabaseValueToJavaObject(Object defaultValue, int dataType, int columnSize, int decimalDigits) throws ParseException {
00210         if (defaultValue == null) {
00211             return null;
00212         }
00213 
00214         if (defaultValue instanceof String) {
00215             if (((String) defaultValue).startsWith("('")) {
00216                 defaultValue = ((String) defaultValue).replaceFirst("^\\('", "").replaceFirst("'\\)$", "");
00217             } else if (((String) defaultValue).startsWith("((")) {
00218                 defaultValue = ((String) defaultValue).replaceFirst("^\\(\\(", "").replaceFirst("\\)\\)$", "");
00219             }
00220         }
00221 
00222         defaultValue = super.convertDatabaseValueToJavaObject(defaultValue, dataType, columnSize, decimalDigits);
00223         
00224         return defaultValue;
00225     }
00226 
00227     public String escapeTableName(String schemaName, String tableName) {
00228         if (schemaName == null) {
00229             return "["+tableName+"]";
00230         } else {
00231             return "["+schemaName+"].["+tableName+"]";
00232         }
00233     }
00234 
00235     public String convertRequestedSchemaToCatalog(String requestedSchema) throws JDBCException {
00236         return getDefaultCatalogName();
00237     }
00238 
00239     public String convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(String requestedSchema) throws JDBCException {
00240         if (requestedSchema == null) {
00241             return "dbo";
00242         }
00243         return requestedSchema;
00244     }

00246     public SqlStatement getViewDefinitionSql(String schemaName, String viewName) throws JDBCException {
00247         String sql = "select view_definition from information_schema.views where upper(table_name)='" + viewName.toUpperCase() + "'";
00248 //        if (StringUtils.trimToNull(schemaName) != null) {
00249             sql += " and table_schema='" + convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schemaName) + "'";
00250             sql += " and table_catalog='" + getDefaultCatalogName() + "'";
00251 //        }
00252 
00253 //        log.info("GetViewDefinitionSQL: "+sql);
00254         return new RawSqlStatement(sql);
00255     }

00257     public String getColumnType(String columnType, Boolean autoIncrement) {
00258         String type = super.getColumnType(columnType, autoIncrement);
00259         if (autoIncrement != null && autoIncrement) {
00260             type = type.replaceFirst(" identity$", "");
00261         }
00262         return type;
00263     }
